name: QUARANTINI
description:
A cute story about 2 girls getting through quarantine together.

Developer: Sofi Naydenova

Special thanks to Tammio for the song!

https://soundcloud.com/sonkintammio

How to Install: 

For Windows users: Download, unzip, play!

For Mac users: Download, unzip, right-click Open, press "open anyway" (sometimes need to repeat this twice), play!

Stay chill&home <3
